Dachigam National Park, nestled in the Himalayas, hosts the rare Hangul deer. Hemis National Park, famed for the vibrant Hemis Festival, offers a chance to spot the elusive snow leopard. Gulmarg Biosphere Reserve transforms into a lush green paradise during the summer months. Kishtwar National Park beckons adventure seekers with its rugged terrain, while Salim Ali National Park in Srinagar provides a tranquil urban escape.
